professional_summary: Hi, I'm Fabi, a full stack developer living in the UK for more than six years. Hardworking and dedicated, I'm passionate about technology and love what I do as a job.

More than four years ago I decided to follow my heart and jump into a web developer career. In the last few years, I have delivered solutions for applications in many different areas like e-Commerce, CRM, ERP and more. Using Laravel and Vue.js together I have been able to build amazing things.

description: -Built a million-pound football membership platform from scratch.
-In two years with the help of my teammates created a very scalable application already used by three clubs and with four more in the way.
-This application has 99% of the backend tested with PHPUnit, Vue components tested with Vue Test Utils and Jest and End to end tests with Nightwatch.js and Cucumber.js.
-Connects with third party services like Stripe and multiples SSO.
-CD/CI using GitHub actions, containers and AWS.
-Facades do deal with multiple clubs' environments.
-Create relational architecture which is used all along with the business, like in the fulfilment system.
-Create static pages using Nuxt.js and collaborate with the company ERP.
-Responsible for analysing issues, designing and coding new features and improvements for an existing web application using Laravel, Jquery and MySQL.
-Qualified to develop the frontend and backend throughout the Database. Multitenancy monolithic platform with 35 clients and thousands of users.

-Refactored the core of the application reducing class with thousands of lines and hundreds of requests to just a few, applying methods such as DRY and OOP and clean code, making it much easier to maintain and escalate.
-Restructured the database, creating referential integrity between registers and index running multiples SYNC to fix old hardcoded code.

-Worked directly in a creation of a Microservice for reports, wherein a night routine all the data were migrated from MYSQL to a MongoDB instance making the reports generation instantly to the users and leaving the MYSQL free for requests during the day.
-Helped to migrate the server from an old legacy Windows Server to Linux in AWS. I have used other relevant tools like Docker, Continues Integration, GitLab, SSH.

I have started my developer career in the UK in the last four years, where I have studied full time for a year and then lading to my first job as a developer. While living in Brazil, worked in business management for more than ten years, which help me build the professional I am nowadays and achieve the lead position in my current job.
